## utils.checkRequiredProperty() function

Checks whether the properties object provided contains the specified property.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function checkRequiredProperty(options: {
    property: string;
    inObject: object;
}): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { property: string; inObject: object; } |  |

**Returns:**

void

void

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->SyntaxError<!-- -->} If the property is not a key in the properties object.
